scripts.docs:watch: npx skl-reload --node-runner yarn --path docs --ui-repo https://github.com/skalenetwork/doc-ui.git --ui-path doc-ui --ui-only --docs-playbook local-playbook-ui.yml --docs-stacktrace --watch-paths docs/**/*.yml,docs/**/*.adoc --watch-event change --server-open --server-dir build/site/
